articles.title: Sudan's Bashir and allies out of jail, fighting flares - Reuters
articles.description: Sudan's army and a paramilitary force battled on the outskirts of the capital on Wednesday, undermining a truce in an 11-day conflict that civilian groups fear could rev…
articles.content: DUBAI, April 26 (Reuters) - Sudan's army and a paramilitary force battled on the outskirts of the capital on Wednesday, undermining a truce in an 11-day conflict that civilian groups fear could reviv… [+4994 chars]
